title: Job Vacancies at Gozoman Integrated Services Limited
content:
Gozoman Integrated Services Limited, a Manpower Supply and Management company, is recruiting suitably qualified candidates to fill the following positions below:

1.) Legal Officer

Job Location: Port Harcourt, Rivers
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description


	Ensure regulatory compliance with cooperative and financial laws.
	Draft and review contracts, policies, and legal documents.
	Liaise with regulators and legal authorities.


Requirements
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Law degree and call to bar (LLB, BL).
	3–5 years of experience in corporate or compliance law.
	Familiarity with cooperative or fintech regulations.
	Must be resident in Port Harcourt.


Salary
N200,000 - N250,000 Monthly.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: Gozomanservices@yahoo.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

 

 

2.) Location: Port Harcourt, Rivers

Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description


	Daily collection of contributions from members.
	Field-level onboarding and KYC of new contributors.
	Submit daily remittance and reports.
	Build and maintain strong, trust-based relationships with cooperative members in the community.
	Collect daily contributions from assigned cooperative members accurately and transparently.
	Conduct field-level onboarding of new contributors, including proper KYC (Know Your Customer) verification.
	Ensure timely submission of daily remittances to the Supervisor or designated officer.
	Prepare and submit daily reports on contributions, collections, and field activities.
	Promptly escalate any discrepancies, challenges, or risks to the Supervisor.
	Support the implementation of cooperative initiatives at the grassroots level, including savings mobilization and loan administration.
	Uphold ethical practices and transparency in all member interactions and financial transactions.
	Convert and onboard new members into theCooperative system.
	Educate members on the use ofdigital savings platform.
	Conduct follow-up visits to ensure daily thrift contributions are made.
	Provide daily reports and feedback on field activities through assigned digital tools.


Key Performance Indicators (KPIs)


	Accuracy and timeliness of daily contribution collections.
	Number of new contributors onboarded and verified through proper KYC.
	Compliance with remittance and reporting timelines.
	Reduction in errors, discrepancies, or unremitted funds.
	Positive community feedback and trust ratings.


Requirements


	OND or equivalent qualification (prior experience in field collections, sales, or community engagement is an advantage).
	Must reside in Port Harcourt.
	High level of trustworthiness, integrity, and accountability.
	Good interpersonal and communication skills.
	Ability to use basic digital tools for reporting and remittance submission.
	Self-motivated and able to work independently in the field.


Key Competencies:


	Community relationship management
	Attention to detail and accuracy in financial handling
	Basic reporting and record-keeping skills
	Trustworthiness and ethical conduct
	Adaptability and resilience in field operations.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: Gozomanservices@yahoo.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

 

 

3.) Accountant

Job Location: Port Harcourt, Rivers
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description


	Handle all state-level financial transactions and reporting.
	Prepare budgets, financial statements, and monitor fund flows.
	Support audits and financial compliance.


Requirements


	B.Sc. / HND in Accounting or Finance.
	Professional certification (ICAN/ACCA) is an advantage.
	At least 3 years in similar roles.
	Must be conversant in the use of an accounting software e.g. sage, peachtree etc


Salary
N200,000 - N250,000 Monthly.

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: Gozomanservices@yahoo.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.
